blogPost.excerpt: Persona offers a suite of fully-automated identity verification components with worldwide coverage that can be configured and branded to create custom-tailored flows for any use case. Sign up for the Starter plan and start for free in <10 minutes.
blogPost.body: Persona offers a suite of fully-automated identity verification components with worldwide coverage that can be configured and branded to create custom-tailored flows for any use case. Sign up for the Starter plan and start for free in <10 minutes.
blogPost.title: Persona - Identity verification for any use case, starting at $0
blogPost.author: Dylan Field

localize.description: Persona提供了一套覆盖全球的全自动身份验证组件，可进行配置和品牌化，为任何用例创建定制化的流程。注册入门计划，并在<10分钟内免费开始使用。
localize.tagline: 任何用例的身份验证，起价为0美元。

localize.description: Persona提供了一套覆蓋全球的全自動身份驗證組件，可進行配置和品牌化，爲任何用例創建定製化的流程。註冊入門計劃，並在<10分鐘內免費開始使用。

next.excerpt: Amplication is an open source development tool. It helps you develop quality Node.js applications without spending time on repetitive coding tasks.
next.title: Amplication - Instantly generate Node.js apps with GraphQL and REST API

localize.description: Amplication是一个开源的开发工具。它可以帮助你开发高质量的Node.js应用，而无需花费时间在重复的编码任务上。
localize.tagline: 使用GraphQL和REST API即时生成Node.js应用。

localize.description: Amplication是一個開源的開發工具。它可以幫助你開發高質量的Node.js應用，而無需花費時間在重複的編碼任務上。
